This function creates a workspace in a GeoServer instance
The CreateGeoServerWorkspace return TRUE when the workspace was created, FALSE otherwise (check message returned)

### Example
  
```coffee
library(rGeoServer)

setwd("~/Downloads")

workspace.name <- "GeoServer.workspace"
access.point <- "http://localhost:8080/geoserver/rest"

result <- CreateGeoServerWorkspace(access.point, workspace.name)

```
